message.content:
cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI 

The paper discusses the development of an expert system using Artificial Neural Networks to improve customer satisfaction on product's colors and design. This involves capturing the knowledge of experts and processing customer requirements to form appropriate rules for choosing product's colors and design. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-categories of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC), and Machine Learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the use of Artificial Neural Networks to classify colors and design based on selected information suggests that the paper may also belong to the sub-categories of Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI).
